org.hibernate.spatial

Class HibernateSpatialConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.spatial.HibernateSpatialConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HibernateSpatialConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A global configuration object that is is used by some Dialects during construction.
